metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15530 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - untriaged.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Valve Steam Client 2.10.91.91. The installer allows local users to gain NT AUTHORITY\SYSTEM privileges because some parts of %PROGRAMFILES(X86)%\Steam and/or %COMMONPROGRAMFILES(X86)%\Steam have weak permissions during a critical time window. An attacker can make this time window arbitrarily long by using opportunistic locks.

criterions.comment: steam: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
